searchresult.abstract: A new and distinct Hosta plant named Ã¢ÂÂBeckoningÃ¢ÂÂ characterized by heart-shaped, large-sized, leaves with blue-green margins, yellowish leaf centers, tall vertical flower scapes with many near white flowers held nicely above foliage, suitable for landscape, potted culture, or cut flower arrangements.

searchresult.abstract: A new cultivar of hybrid Hosta, Ã¢ÂÂGrand MarqueeÃ¢ÂÂ, characterized by its unique variegated foliage with wide blue-green margins and creamy white centers, its upright, mounding and relatively compact plant habit, and pale lavender flowers positioned above the foliage on strong and erect flower scapes.
searchresult.claim_text: 1 . A new and distinct cultivar of hosta plant named ‘Grand Marquee’ as herein illustrated and described.

searchresult.abstract: A new and distinct Hosta cultivar named Ã¢ÂÂBen VernooijÃ¢ÂÂ is disclosed, characterized by distinctive round foliage on thick petioles, vigorous plant habit and strong foliage, with good resistance to environmental stressors and large flowers. The near variety is a Hosta, typically used for outdoor ornamental purposes.

searchresult.abstract: A new and distinct cultivar of Hosta named Ã¢ÂÂAmbrosia, characterized by its large sized mounding clump, blue leaf margin with a light yellow center, the presence of a heavy glaucous wax over the entire leaf surface, vigorous growth rate, and pale lavender fragrant flowers.
